query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Collation of Accessible Textual, Visual and Performance Based Accounts of Spatial Justice in Europe
result.description: A collection of textual, visual and performance-based representations of spatial justice and territorial inequalities based on data from WPs 1-7, for dissemination to a variety of audiences. This may the take form of infographs, posters, cartoons, short videos, blog posts or other media forms, as led by the research participants.
